snippet: A Hummelstown police officer waived a preliminary hearing Monday on charges that she murdered a man who had run away from a traffic stop by shooting him twice in the back as he lay face-down in the snow.
abstract: Pennsylvania Police Officer Lisa Mearkle waives preliminary hearing on charges that she murdered David Kassick, suspect who had run away during a traffic stop, by shooting him in back; is free on bail with electronic monitoring.
lead_paragraph: A Hummelstown police officer waived a preliminary hearing Monday on charges that she murdered a man who had run away from a traffic stop by shooting him twice in the back as he lay face-down in the snow.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Officer Free on Bond on Murder Charge
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Officer Free on Bond on Murder Charge
